strapiPost.title: Plug and Play Expo Coming To Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
Plug and Play Northwest Arkansas announced they will be hosting a supply chain expo this coming Tuesday, April 26, from 1-6p at the Record in Bentonville. 

  • What: The event will feature 20 alumni startups in the supply chain and logistics arena and highlight achievements of their corporate partners. The Walmart US President and CEO will serve as the keynote speaker, and other top industry executives and experts will speak on the future of supply chain and logistics. 
  • Who: Plug and Play is a global innovation platform that connects corporations with startups. The company has worked with over 30,000 startups and has over 500 official corporate partners. Companies in the Plug and Play community have raised over $9 billion in funding, and some successful portfolio exits include Danger, Dropbox, Lending Club, and PayPal. 

Learn more and register for the expo HERE.
